entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 6 except plus 3 in low lying inland areas. Risk of frost.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19 except 16 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 19 except 16 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
